meanings.definition: Resembling an ant in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The tiny creature had an antlike body, with six legs and a small head.
meanings.sent2: The antlike movements of the worker bee caught the observer's attention.
meanings.sent3: The antlike robot diligently carried out its programmed tasks.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous attention to detail was so antlike that she never missed a spot.
meanings.sent5: The antlike soldier followed orders with unwavering discipline.

meanings.definition: In the manner of an ant.
meanings.sent1: The tiny creature scurried antlike across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: The worker bee moved antlike from flower to flower, collecting nectar.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they imitated the antlike march of the insects.
meanings.sent4: She worked antlike through the crowd, weaving her way to the front.
meanings.sent5: The team moved antlike, in perfect synchronization, towards their goal.
